column5: Hows it going guys and gals ........ I am new to the area and am looking to get together with some goose/duck hunters in KW. I have a working lab and have only hunted birds for about 2 years. I have not been able to find a good website for bird hunters like here @ OFC. If anyone knows of a similar web site please let me know. Thanks all    email [emailÂ protected]

Hey Wildpete,  Welcome to the site!  I'm also and avid waterfowler. Once duck season comes around, my fishing gear collects dust!  Check your PM's......I've sent you a couple links to waterfowling forums I participate in.  Sinker

I've been told the surrounding areas, particularly the mennonite lands have excellent duck hunting....you might want to take a drive and follow the geese lol...then ask the land owner if you can hunt on their land
